item.title: Burnt our vehicle blocking our car, 30th June
item.description:
A car was dumped and torched outside the gate to our driveway on Vanbrugh Terrace late last night. CAD 8348/ 29JUN25. The car is blocking our drive and this morning I couldn't take my children to nursery by car. have two very young children (1 and 4) and I need access to the car for nursery and for medical appointments this week. Please can someone come and remove the car? Thank you!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 139, Langton Way, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet
